name: Sakamoto
description:
This is a theme featuring Sakamoto from Nichijou!
I got all the codes and everything from many different themes, so its hard to credit one specific theme.
If this is accepted I may do more featuring other anime characters.
The dashboard icons can be found here:http://userstyles.org/styles/39858/cute-icons
Photo can be found on my Tumblr:http://aweshumpics.tumblr.com/ [under the Sakamoto tag]
